A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While not the worst movie\, it's not very good either.  It's like the movie had 2 writers with 2 different stories. One was harrowing\, but constantly Interrupted by an alternate weak storyline. Carrie Fisher\, not a good performance. Yoda is about the most evolved and interestin in this one.  Porgs initially ok\, but over used and turned into furby minion tribbles.  Liked Laura Dern a lot in this.  Comedy wasn't welcomein the manner presented.
